ingredients: 1 (16.5 ounce) package refrigerated sliceable sugar cookies, sliced, 1 (8 ounce) package PHILADELPHIA Cream Cheese, softened,   +   1/4 cup sugar,   +   1/2 teaspoon vanilla, 4 cups assorted cut-up fruit (kiwi, strawberries, blueberries, drained canned mandarin oranges),   +   1/4 cup apricot preserves, pressed through sieve to remove lumps, 1 tablespoon water
nutrition: Total Fat 15g 20%, Saturated Fat 6g 29%, Cholesterol 25mg 8%, Sodium 218mg 9%, Total Carbohydrate 36g 13%, Dietary Fiber 1g 4%, Total Sugars 17g, Protein 3g, Vitamin C 30mg 149%, Calcium 9mg 1%, Iron 1mg 7%, Potassium 91mg 2%
